frege.runtime

Class Regex9

  • java.lang.Object
    • frege.runtime.Regex9

  • public class Regex9
extends java.lang.Object

    Helper functions for PreludeBase and PreludeRegex

    The methods here help us to hide the Matcher type, which is impure, and cannot made pure, because copying is effectively impossible at least from JDK9 on.

    Instead, all Frege code will work with MatchResult, which is a pure interface, and since JDK9 apparently backed by an immutable class.
